name: Pillow Clicker TD 2
description:
Cushions are invading again! Use new and old towers from your arsenal to destroy new waves of cushion foes in 3 different worlds!

Rack up crystals to unlock extra challenges and fight in the gauntlet for crazy rewards!

Fight in 75+ levels with tons and tons of mad cushions and try to survive...

and stay on the look for future updates with new towers, enemies, levels and loads more!
